name: Vivaland: Dream House
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1976830

Introducing the Vivaland Prologue: Dream House

Build Mode: Craft Your Dreams

Immerse yourself in one of the core game modes of Vivaland: the Build Mode. It's a sandbox where you have control over architectural and design elements, enabling you to construct and decorate a house from the ground up!

Get to Know the First Town of Vivaland

The town of Vivaland offers 8 residential lots, each awaiting your personal touch. Claim your slice of the town, visit your friends' properties, and collaborate on grand projects that will redefine the neighborhood.

Seamless Single and Co-op Experience

Begin your Vivaland adventure either as a lone explorer or with your friends by your side – the choice is yours. You can build together with up to 8 players
Content

  • Walls Toolkit: Build with single wall, curved wall and the room tool!
  • Doors & Windows: Choose entrances and views that reflect your taste.
  • Foundations, Multiple Floors, and Stairs: Build structures that rise to new heights.
  • Furniture: Design with a vast selection of interior items.
  • Roofing: Choose from 10 distinct styles and an array of roof patterns.
  • Different styles of items: Bohemian, Retro, Victorian, Antique, Cottagecore, Gothic, Modern, Minimalist, Industrial.

Functional Freedom

  • Resizable Objects: Adjusting the size of decorative objects.
  • Recolorable Furniture and Decor: Fine-tune your interior design with your color palettes. Save favorite shades and match your items.
  • Room Dimension Flexibility: Tweak the height and width of your rooms.
  • Grid Function: Precise item placement is a breeze with toggleable grid support.
  • Intuitive Controls and Snapping: Seamlessly move and arrange objects.
